entities: United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC)
summary:
41. Affirms the importance of voluntary, safe, orderly return and sustainable reintegration of internally displaced persons.

42. Requests that the Secretary-General reports to the Council every three months on developments in Afghanistan.

43. Further requests that the Secretary-General conduct a comprehensive review of UNAMA’s mandated activities and the United Nations’ support in Afghanistan by the end of 2011.

44. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
